MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG11 area of Lockerbie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:31am. Our engineers have arrived at the Springwellgate substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:32am on Sunday, 01 November 2020
